eula_intro: This User Agreement (Agreement) governs your use of our services, including the online card game platform available at https://svarapro.com (Service). By accessing or using the Service, you confirm that you have read and agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement.
eula_acceptance_body: By registering for or using our Service, you agree to comply with the terms of this Agreement and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with these terms, please discontinue using the Service immediately.
eula_eligibility_body: You must be at least 18 years old or of legal age in your jurisdiction to use the Service. By using the Service, you confirm that it is legal in your jurisdiction. You are fully responsible for complying with the laws of your country, region, or state.
eula_account_body: Registration: You must provide accurate and complete information during registration. Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for any actions taken under your account. Multiple Accounts: Creating and using multiple accounts is prohibited. Violation of this rule may result in the suspension or banning of all related accounts.
eula_fairplay_body: The use of third-party software, bots, or any tools designed to manipulate gameplay is strictly prohibited. Collusion with other players or any form of cheating will result in account suspension and potential loss of digital assets. We reserve the right to monitor gameplay and conduct investigations to ensure fair play.
eula_operations_body: Rake: A 5% rake will be deducted from each pot in cash games. The rake is used to support the operation and maintenance of Svara Pro. Deposits: You may fund your account with digital assets using the methods provided on our platform. Withdrawals: Withdrawals will only be processed in digital assets. We reserve the right to request verification documents before processing any withdrawal.
eula_bonuses_body: We may offer bonuses and promotions from time to time. Each promotion will have its own terms and conditions. Abuse of bonuses or promotions will result in the forfeiture of bonus funds and possible account suspension.
eula_limitation_body: Svara is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our services.
eula_disputes_body: Any disputes arising under this Agreement shall be resolved through mediation. If mediation fails, disputes will be resolved at the location of Svara Pro.
eula_termination_body: You agree that we may, at our sole discretion, terminate this Agreement and suspend or terminate your account on Svara. You agree that any suspension or termination of your access to Svara Pro may occur without prior notice, and we are not liable to you or any third party for such actions.
eula_changes_body: We may update this Agreement from time to time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting. Your continued use of our services signifies your acceptance of these changes.
gamerules_deal_body: At the start of the game, each player is dealt three cards face down. The dealer is chosen randomly. In the next round, the dealer becomes the player who won the current round.
gamerules_bets_body: In the game of Svara, there are three types of bets: ante, blind, and regular bets.
gamerules_ante_body: Before the deal, each player places an initial bet to participate in the game. This bet, called the 'Ante,' forms the 'Pot.' The bet amount is the same for all players and is set before the game starts.
gamerules_blind_body: Once the pot is formed, the player to the left of the dealer may place a 'blind' bet without looking at their cards. If the next player also wants to bet blind, they must place double the previous player's bet. If a player chooses not to bet, the blind betting opportunity ends for others as well. This bet is optional, and any player may look at their cards during their turn, ending blind betting. If the player following the blind bettor does not double the bet, the last blind bettor takes the entire pot. Blind betting ends as soon as any player looks at their cards.
gamerules_normalbets_body1: After all players have seen their cards, regular bidding begins. A player who looks at their cards must place a bet double that of the previous player or fold. The game continues clockwise.
gamerules_normalbets_body2: A player who does not place a bet leaves the game. The betting round ends with the player who made the last blind bet or the dealer if no one bet blindly. If no bets are placed, the dealer takes the entire pot. The game continues only if bets are raised. If the round ends without raised bets, all remaining players reveal their cards, and the player with the highest points wins.
gamerules_svara_body1: If the revealed players have the same number of points, a Svara is declared. These players start a new game, playing for the untouched pot. Any player may join by contributing an amount equal to the pot.
gamerules_svara_body2: The new game follows regular rules. If the game ends with equal points again, another Svara is declared, and the process repeats with an increased pot.
gamerules_count_body: Card combinations determine your hand's point value. If no combinations are present, points are calculated based on the highest card's nominal value:
gamerules_table_row_9: 7 of Clubs (Joker) – special card worth 11 points
gamerules_combos_body1: Two cards of the same suit are counted by their nominal value.
gamerules_combos_body2: For example, if you have 8♠ Q♠ Q♥, the combination is only 8♠ and Q♠, totaling 18 points.
gamerules_combos_body3: Three of a kind – three cards of the same rank. Counted by nominal value.
gamerules_combos_body4: For example, a hand of J♥ J♦ J♣ totals 30 points.
gamerules_special_body1: Two Aces of any suit total 22 points.
gamerules_special_body2: Two Sevens of any suit total 23 points.
gamerules_special_body3: 7 of Clubs (Joker) gives a maximum of 11 points in combination with two cards of the same suit, e.g., 7♣ 9♠ J♠ yields 30 points.
gamerules_special_body4: Three Sevens of any suit yield a maximum of 34 points.
gamerules_example1: 7♠ 8♣ 8♦ – weak hand, no combinations, only 8 points.
gamerules_example2: 7♣ 8♣ 8♦ – 7♣ forms a combination with two eights, totaling 27 points.
gamerules_example4: J♦ Q♥ A♥ – Q♥ and A♥ combine, yielding 21 points.
gamerules_example5: 9♥ A♣ A♦ – special combination of two Aces, yielding 22 points.
gamerules_example6: 9♦ 10♦ K♦ – three cards of the same suit, totaling 29 points.
gamerules_example7: K♠ K♦ K♥ – three cards of the same rank, totaling 30 points.
gamerules_example8: 7♣ 7♦ 7♥ – the strongest combination in the game, 34 points.
gamerules_terms_body1: Dealer – the player dealing the cards, usually the last to bet in a round.
gamerules_terms_body2: Ante – the initial bet placed by players to participate in the game.
gamerules_terms_body3: Blind Bet – a bet placed before players see their cards.
gamerules_terms_body4: Regular Bet – any bet placed after all players have seen their cards.
gamerules_terms_body5: Pot – the sum of all players' bets in one game.
gamerules_terms_body6: Svara – a situation where multiple players have the same point total.
gamerules_terms_body8: We’ve aimed to make the game rules as clear and straightforward as possible. If you have any questions or need further clarification, please let us know!
refrules_intro: Invite referrals and earn a percentage of their deposits based on the number of referred participants:
refrules_condition1: The referral must deposit $100 or more.
refrules_condition2: Percentages are earned on each deposit made by a referred user.
refrules_condition3: The more referrals and their deposits, the higher your earnings!
refrules_condition4: Start inviting and increase your earnings today!
refrules_condition5: When your accumulated balance reaches $10, the amount is automatically transferred to your game balance.

insufficient_balance_x3_error: Your balance must be at least 10 times the minimum stake.
